# maxFrameDuration

**Instance Property**

The maximum frame duration supported by the range.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxFrameDuration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is the reciprocal of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFrameRateRange/minFrameRate], and expresses the minimum frame rate as a duration.

## Accessing properties

- **maxFrameRate**: The maximum frame rate supported by the range.
- **minFrameDuration**: The minimum frame duration supported by the range.
- **minFrameRate**: The minimum frame rate supported by the range.
